mapper.sql: s.id, s.title, s.file_url, s.cover_url, s.genre, s.duration, s.lyrics, s.description, s.play_count, s.artist_id, a.name AS artistName, s.album_id AS albumId, alb.title AS albumTitle, COALESCE( alb.cover_url, ( SELECT s2.cover_url FROM music_song s2 WHERE s2.album_id = alb.id AND s2.cover_url IS NOT NULL AND s2.cover_url <> '' ORDER BY s2.create_time ASC, s2.id ASC LIMIT 1 ) ) AS albumCover, s.create_time AS releaseTime
mapper.select: SELECT FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id ORDER BY s.play_count DESC

SELECT FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id WHERE s.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id WHERE s.id IN
#{id}
SELECT FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id WHERE s.artist_id = #{artistId}
SELECT FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
SELECT FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id WHERE s.album_id = #{albumId} ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
SELECT FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id ORDER BY s.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id ORDER BY s.play_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN music_song_genre msg ON s.id = msg.song_id LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id WHERE msg.genre_id = #{genreId} ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE music_song SET play_count = play_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(play_count), 0) FROM music_song WHERE artist_id = #{artistId}
SELECT cover_url FROM music_song WHERE album_id = #{albumId} AND cover_url IS NOT NULL AND cover_url <> '' ORDER BY create_time ASC, id ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT s.id, s.title, s.cover_url, s.play_count AS playCount, COALESCE(metric.likeCount, 0) AS likeCount, metric.avgRating FROM music_song s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT song_id, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS likeCount, AVG(rating) AS avgRating FROM user_interaction GROUP BY song_id ) metric ON metric.song_id = s.id WHERE s.artist_id = #{artistId} ORDER BY s.play_count DESC
